alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Bladen, southeastern Robeson, Columbus, Florence, Dillon, east central Darlington, Horry, Marion, southeastern Marlboro and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brownsville to Lake City. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Conway, Marion, Dillon, Lake City, Whiteville, Mullins, Red Hill, Horry, Tabor City, Loris, Chadbourn, Bethel, Johnsonville, Latta, Pamplico, Fair Bluff, Quinby, Lake View and Hickory Grove. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 163 and 192. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 12 and 18. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
